document_data.name: Plaguegrass
document_data.mainbody: '''Plaguegrass''' was grass that had been [[Plaguechanged|touched]] by the [[Spellplague]] and which grew only within the borders of the [[Plaguewrought Land]].
document_data.Description: Plaguegrass had blue crystals growing on the stalks.
document_data.Usage: The grass was a key ingredient in an elixir that blocked the effects of [[spellscar]]s and the Spellplague, such as was devised by the [[alchemist]] [[Gregor]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
